metadata.title: CVE-2024-39489 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ipv6: sr: fix memleak in seg6_hmac_init_algoseg6_hmac_init_algo returns without cleaning up the previous allocationsif one fails, so it's going to leak all that memory and the crypto tfms.Update seg6_hmac_exit to only free the memory when allocated, so we canreuse the code directly.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
